# beginBatch()

**Instance Method**

Begins a batch of updates to an index.

## Declaration

```swift
func beginBatch()
```

## Discussion

Don’t call this method again before [doc://com.apple.corespotlight/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSSearchableIndex/endBatch(withClientState:completionHandler:)] has returned. (You can call it again before the completion handler passed to [doc://com.apple.corespotlight/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSSearchableIndex/endBatch(withClientState:completionHandler:)] has been called.)

## Batching index updates

- **endBatch(withClientState:completionHandler:)**: Ends a batch of index updates and stores the specified state information.
- **endIndexBatch(expectedClientState:newClientState:completionHandler:)**: Ends a batch of index updates and stores the specified state information.
- **fetchLastClientState(completionHandler:)**: Fetches the app’s most recent client state information asynchronously.
